<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition table="x_sigh_ausleihsyst_order">bestellungstatus=^EQ<item display_value="-- None --" endquery="false" field="bestellungstatus" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></condition><description>Allow create for records in x_sigh_ausleihsyst_order, if the ACL script returns true, and if the ACL condition (bestellungstatus=^EQ) evaluates to true.</description><name>x_sigh_ausleihsyst_order</name><operation display_value="create">create</operation><script><![CDATA[if(gs.hasRole('x_sigh_ausleihsyst.guest') || gs.hasRole("x_sigh_ausleihsyst.Ausleiher")||gs.hasRole("x_sigh_ausleihsyst.mitarbeiter")
  ||gs.hasRole("x_sigh_ausleihsyst.Verleiher"))

   {

   answer = true;

}

else {

   answer = false;

}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-14 07:02:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>a17bf76797f5d110f7823d400153af58</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_sigh_ausleihsyst_order</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AusleihSystem" source="x_sigh_ausleihsyst">ce31d7851b35d5107165fdd49b4bcb87</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AusleihSystem">ce31d7851b35d5107165fdd49b4bcb87</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_a17bf76797f5d110f7823d400153af58</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-14 09:52:04</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
